content: This has to be the most intense piece I’ve read recently. Words and comments won’t do justice thanking you for your bravery in putting your heart out this way. I don’t have any advice or comforting words. But I couldn’t leave this page without saying (or leaving a small mark) that says I read it and heard you. I am not sure “thank you” is suitable here, but for what it’s worth, thank you giving me the chance to read this. Keep crazy, keep creating.
